meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family with aromatic leaves and seeds.
meanings.sent1: The smallages in the garden smelled so nice.
meanings.sent2: She used smallages to add flavor to her cooking.
meanings.sent3: The smallages whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The smallages danced in the breeze like tiny fairies.
meanings.sent5: The smallages stood tall, proud of their fragrant essence.

meanings.sent3: The smallages of coins in his pocket jingled happily.
